title: Performance notes: stay under 2s
summary: A practical checklist for keeping initial load < 2s and interactions < 100ms on GitHub Pages.

items.title: Bundle budget
items.body: Keep initial JS minimal; load search index after first paint.

items.title: List rendering
items.body: If posts grow large, virtualize (or paginate) the home feed.

blocks.title: Why prebuild search?
blocks.code:
npm run prebuild
# generates src/generated/search-index.json used by lazy SearchModal
blocks.note: This avoids indexing work during the critical path of initial paint.
